verses.text: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*; I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* and give \w praise|strong="H2167"\w*, even with my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.
\w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H5035"\w* and \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*: I \add myself\add* will \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* \w early|strong="H7837"\w*.

I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and I will sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto thee among the \w nations|strong="H3816"\w*.

For thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* above the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: and thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \add reacheth\add* unto the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*.\f + \fr 108.4 \ft clouds: or, skies\f*
Be thou \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, above the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: and thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* above all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;
That thy \w beloved|strong="H3039"\w* may be \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w*: \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \add with\add* thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* me.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*; I will \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w*, I will \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and mete \w out|strong="H4058"\w* the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*.

\w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \add is\add* mine; \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add is\add* mine; \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* also \add is\add* the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add is\add* my \w lawgiver|strong="H2710"\w*;

\w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \add is\add* my \w washpot|strong="H7366"\w*; over \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* will I cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* my \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w*; over \w Philistia|strong="H6429"\w* will I \w triumph|strong="H7321"\w*.
Who will \w bring|strong="H2986"\w* me into the \w strong|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*? who will \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me into \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*?

\add Wilt\add* not \add thou\add*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add who\add* hast cast us \w off|strong="H2186"\w*? and wilt not thou, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* with our \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*?
\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* us \w help|strong="H5833"\w* from \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*: for \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \add is\add* the \w help|strong="H8668"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.
Through \w God|strong="H0430"\w* we shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w valiantly|strong="H2428"\w*: for he \add it is that\add* shall tread \w down|strong="H0947"\w* our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.
